src:
Mendagri Tito Minta Maaf Datang Telat di Raker Perdana Komisi II DPR
06 Nov 2019, 15:04 by Eva Safitri
Jakarta - Menteri Dalam Negeri (Mendagri) Tito Karnavian mengawali pemaparannya dengan mengucapkan permintaan maaf kepada komisi II DPR RI. Dia meminta maaf karena datang terlambat dalam rapat kerja (raker) perdana bersama Komisi II.
"Saya pertama minta maaf terlambat," ujar Tito dalam rapat, di ruang rapat komisi II, Kompleks Parlemen, Jakarta Selatan, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Tito menjelaskan dirinya menghadiri acara serah terima jabatan Kapolri terlebih dahulu di Mako Brimob, Kelapa Dua, Depok. Acara itu dimulai pukul 05.30 WIB.
"Karena dari pagi saya sudah berangkat pukul 5.30 WIB, dari rumah (ke agenda) yang sudah direncanakan juga, yaitu acara serah terima Kapolri secara resmi," ucapnya.
"Meskipun Jenderal Idham Aziz sudah dilantik oleh Presiden, tetapi secara internal selalu ada acara yang dilaksanakan di Mako Brimob Kelapa Dua," lanjut Tito.
text:
Minister of Home Affairs Tito Apologizes for Coming Late to the House of Representatives Commission II Prime Meeting
Nov 6, 2019, 15:04 by Eva Safitri
Jakarta - Minister of the Interior (Mendagri) Tito Karnavian started his presentation by saying an apology to the commission II DPR RI. He apologized for arriving late at the inaugural working meeting (Raker) with Commission II.
"I am sorry for being late," Tito said in a meeting, in the Commission II meeting room, Parliament Complex, South Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Tito explained that he attended the handover ceremony for the Chief of Police in advance at Mako Brimob, Kelapa Dua, Depok. The event began at 05.30 WIB.
"Because from the morning I left at 5:30 IWST, from home (to the agenda) that had been planned as well, namely the official handover ceremony of the National Police," he said.
"Even though General Idham Aziz has been inaugurated by the President, internally there are always events held at the Mako Brimob Kelapa Dua," Tito continued.
